citations.narrative:
The facility has excessive chew damage present on multiple surfaces in the facility. The ramps used for the dogs to
access the outdoor runs have chew damage on the edges and corners. One whelping box has chew damage present on
the top rim and corners. The wooden frame around the pet doors and support beams in the indoor area of the kennel
have excessive chew damage. Chew damage does not allow for proper sanitization of surfaces and can increase disease
risk and can create sharp surfaces that can injure the dogs. The licensee must ensure that all surfaces in contact with the
dogs are able to be cleaned and sanitized in accordance with 3.11(b) of this subpart, or replaced when worn or soiled.
Correct by February 8, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The facility has excessive chew damage present on multiple surfaces in the facility. The ramps used for the dogs to 
access the outdoor runs have chew damage on the edges and corners. One whelping box has chew damage present on 
the top rim and corners. The wooden frame around the pet doors and support beams in the indoor area of the kennel 
have excessive chew damage. Chew damage does not allow for proper sanitization of surfaces and can increase disease 
risk and can create sharp surfaces that can injure the dogs. The licensee must ensure that all surfaces in contact with the 
dogs are able to be cleaned and sanitized in accordance with 3.11(b) of this subpart, or replaced when worn or soiled. 
Correct by February  8, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative. 
 
End Section
